node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，與第 #4846 宗個案患者同住於旺角維景酒店等候回中國，8 月 27 日凌晨朋友發現患者頭暈叫救護車送往廣華醫院。患者於送院期間已昏迷，需要急救，至當日凌晨 1 時 39 分病逝，遺體同日早上由食環署人員送往葵涌殮房。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions, and was staying at Metropark Hotel Mongkok with patient #4846 awaiting return to China. On August 27 midnight, his friend discovered that he experienced dizziness, and called an ambulance for Kwong Wa Hospital. He was unconscious on the ambulance, requiring first aid, and passed away at 1:39 a.m. on the day. The corpse was transferred to Kwai Chung Public Mortuary by Food and Environmental Hygiene Department staff on the same day.
